tags.description: Array of tags in the vocabulary. Each tag must have a unique identifier (lowercase, no spaces) and human-readable label. Tags may optionally have descriptions explaining when to apply them, parent IDs for hierarchical organization, and example items.

id.description: Unique identifier for the tag (lowercase, no spaces)

description.description: Brief description of when to apply this tag (optional but recommended)

parent.description: Parent tag ID for hierarchical organization (optional, must reference an existing tag ID)
